meanings.definition: A style or method of cooking, especially as characteristic of a particular country or region.
meanings.sent1: French cuisine includes dishes like croissants and ratatouille.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy trying different cuisines when I travel to new places.
meanings.sent3: The Italian cuisine whispered delicious secrets to the French cuisine.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking was a blend of traditional cuisine and modern flair.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cuisine filled the entire house, tempting everyone to the dinner table.

meanings.definition: Food prepared in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The spicy cuisine from Mexico always makes my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent2: She learned to appreciate the art of Japanese cuisine during her trip.
meanings.sent3: The cuisine at the school cafeteria seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His words were a cuisine of emotions, leaving her heart satisfied.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cuisine on the plate looked like a work of art, almost too beautiful to eat.
